binding.label: KU Function: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['GPC', 'GPC DESIG', 'AUTO TRACK', 'MAN SLEW']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: KU Mode: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['RDR PASS', 'RDR COOP', 'COMM']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: S-Band PM Mode: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['SGLS', 'S-LO', 'S-HI', 'TDRS DATA', 'TDRS RNG']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: S-Band FM Data Source: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['DOD', 'MMU 2', 'OFF', 'ME', 'MMU 1', 'PL DIGITAL', 'PL ANLG', 'TV']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Gas Gen/Fuel Pump Heat 1: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['Off', 'Auto A', 'Auto B']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Gas Gen/Fuel Pump Heat 2: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['Off', 'Auto A', 'Auto B']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Gas Gen/Fuel Pump Heat 3: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['Off', 'Auto A', 'Auto B']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Lube Oil Line Heat 1: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['Off', 'Auto A', 'Auto B']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Lube Oil Line Heat 2: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['Off', 'Auto A', 'Auto B']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Lube Oil Line Heat 3: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['Off', 'Auto A', 'Auto B']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: GPS Pre-Amp Upper: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'MN A', 'MN C']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: GPS Pre-Amp Lower: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'MN A', 'MN C']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Forward RCS Heater: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'A AUTO', 'B AUTO']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: AV Bay Air Temp: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['AV Bay 1', 'AV Bay 2', 'AV Bay 3', 'Cabin']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Flow Meter: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['SYS 1 O2', 'SYS 1 N2', 'SYS 2 O2', 'SYS 2 N2']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: PPO2 Sensor: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['Sensor A', 'Sensor B']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Pressure Selector: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['RCS He X10', 'RCS PRPLT', 'OMS PRPLT']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Propellent Quantity: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['RCS OXID', 'RCS FUEL', 'LOWEST', 'OMS OXID', 'OMS FUEL']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Left RCS Tank Iso 3/4/5 A Fuel: %s
Left RCS Tank Iso 3/4/5 B Fuel: %s

Left RCS Manifold Iso Valve 5 fuel: %s
